verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: he is thinking " very seriously " about pardoning the late Muhammad Ali , an act of clemency that the boxer 's lawyer says is unnecessary because the Supreme Court overturned the heavyweight champion 's conviction in 1971] .

WASHINGTON ( AP ) — President Donald Trump said he [V: is] thinking " very seriously " about pardoning the late Muhammad Ali , an act of clemency that the boxer 's lawyer says is unnecessary because the Supreme Court overturned the heavyweight champion 's conviction in 1971 .
